items.question: What video formats are supported for background changing?
items.answer: We support various video formats including MP4, MOV, and AVI. Ensure videos are of good quality for best results when changing backgrounds.

items.question: Can I use custom backgrounds?
items.answer: Absolutely! Users can upload their own images or videos as backgrounds for complete creative freedom.

items.question: How fast can I expect my videos to be processed?
items.answer: The background changing is remarkably quick, usually done within a few minutes depending on the video's length and complexity.

items.question: Is there a limit on the number of videos I can process?
items.answer: No limits! You can process as many videos as you need, all under our flexible pricing structure.

items.question: Are there any specific system requirements?
items.answer: Our platform is web-based and works on most modern browsers. However, a stable internet connection will provide the best experience.

items.question: Can I use the finished videos commercially?
items.answer: Yes! All videos created through WaveSpeed come with commercial usage rights, allowing you to use them freely across various platforms.

items.question: What if I encounter issues during processing?
items.answer: We offer comprehensive support including tutorials and a responsive support team available to assist with any concerns.

items.question: Can I share my finished videos directly on social media?
items.answer: Yes! Once your video is processed, you can easily download it and share it directly on your preferred social media platforms.
